name: Cubebat
description:
CONTROLS

WAD to move, space-bar to attack, keep holding the space-bar to charge, if you space-bar is full, but you still keep holding it, charge bar will reset to zero. There are special abilities in this game.

                                ABILITIES

none -- you don't have any special abilities

Regeneration -- quicker regeneration.

Defence -- take less damage

Damage -- causes more damage to the enemy.

Speed -- run/walk more quickly.

jump -- jump higher

charge -- charge faster

not mobile-friendly :(

if the enemy touches you, you'll lose hearts.
